hero.headline: Build Something Amazing Today

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: This platform has completely transformed how we work. The performance is incredible and the team loves it.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Getting started is easy! Simply click the 'Get Started Free' button and create your account. You'll have access to all features in our Starter plan immediately.

faq.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades will be applied at the end of your current billing cycle.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and PayPal. For Enterprise plans, we also support bank transfers and invoicing.

faq.question: Is there a free trial for paid plans?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for our Pro plan. No credit card required. You'll have full access to all Pro features during the trial period.

faq.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. Your access will continue until the end of your current billing period.
